subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The fiery coach of T.C.U., Gary Patterson, has become a figure of rock star proportions, and the school could be on the verge of crashing the B.C.S. for the first time if it beats No. 16 Utah.
snippet: The fiery coach of T.C.U., Gary Patterson, has become a figure of rock star proportions, and the school could be on the verge of crashing the B.C.S. for the first time if it beats No. 16 Utah.
